intro_text: The patrol finds a nice spot to sun themselves.
decline_text: They decide to stay focused instead.
success_text: The sunlight feels great and the cats have a successful discussion, talking about what came up at the last half-moon meetings and whether it'll affect c_n.
The sunlight energizes the cats for their herb-gathering.
s_c makes sure everyone gets a good basking spot as the cats pause for a little break before resuming their herb-gathering.
fail_text: The patrol doesn't get much done because of that.

intro_text: r_c finds a nice spot to sun themselves.
decline_text: They decide to stay focused instead.
success_text: The sunlight feels great and r_c has a successful patrol.
The sunlight energizes r_c for the rest of their herb-gathering.
fail_text: The patrol doesn't get much done because of that.

intro_text: As the medicine cat's patrol pads out into c_n territory, r_c tells p_l about the dream they had last night, and what the StarClan vision could mean for c_n.
decline_text: The cats don't talk about the vision, mouths too full of herbs.
success_text: They have an in-depth conversation about r_c's vision as they walk. By the time they head back to camp, they have a good idea of what they should do with the information.

p_l takes r_c aside, giving them the full benefits of p_l's experience as they discuss r_c's vision. As a medicine cat, they don't take the responsibility lightly, and both of them work together to divine the vision's meaning.

p_l chooses to pad pelt to pelt with r_c, the spiritual medicine cat gently guiding the conversation. r_c feels deeply privileged and far more at peace after confiding in them, knowing that c_n is in safe paws.
fail_text: p_l shakes their head sadly. They can't make sense of the vision.
r_c notices p_l looking at them enviously, and withdraws from the group, dismissing the dream as unimportant.

intro_text: As the medicine cat's patrol pads out into c_n territory, r_c tells p_l about the dream they had last night, and what the StarClan vision could mean for c_n.
decline_text: The cats don't talk about the vision, mouths too full of herbs.
success_text: They have an in depth conversation about r_c's vision as they walk. By the time they head back to camp, they have a good idea of what they should do with the information.

p_l takes r_c aside, giving them the full benefits of p_l's seniority and experience as they discuss r_c's vision. As a medicine cat, they don't take the responsibility lightly, and both of them work together to divine the vision's meaning.

s_c listens intently and tells r_c not to be weirded out, but they had seen the dream, too. r_c is alarmed but s_c soothes them and explains that StarClan sometimes shows them others' dreams, but this one luckily was just a mild warning.
fail_text: p_l shakes their head sadly. They can't make sense of the vision.
r_c notices p_l looking at them enviously, and withdraws from the group, dismissing the dream as unimportant.

intro_text: As they head out to gather cobwebs, r_c thinks about the dream they had last night. . . was it sent by StarClan?
decline_text: They push it from their mind.
success_text: It definitely distracts them from the hunt for cobwebs, but r_c uses the time by themselves to put their thoughts in order. The sign from their ancestors will need acting upon, and they return to camp to assemble the leader and deputy.

Somehow cobweb-gathering brings r_c to almost a meditative state, and not only are they fairly confident of their next steps having been given this vision, but they also bring back a good haul to the medicine den stocks.

s_c often feels like StarClan walks with them, and this is just another instance on the path. They use the solo patrol to collect their thoughts, and by the time they pad home with a good bundle of cobwebs, they're ready for the next step their vision hinted at.
fail_text: r_c can't make sense of the vision.

intro_text: As r_c pads through c_n territory, they feel a presence join them.
decline_text: Their companion stays with them as silent support while they work.
success_text: With a respectful nod, r_c pauses, tucks their paws together neatly, and sits to converse with the StarClan cat.
The scent of a familiar pelt reaches r_c's nose - they know this cat! With a friendly purr, they turn to greet their friend from beyond the grave.
With the familiarity brought by their connection to StarClan, r_c turns to the ghost haunting their path, meeting their star-walking ancestor with a purr and quiet confidence.
fail_text: The connection wavers, and as quickly as the feeling of company appears, it vanishes.
r_c turns to the ghost with a smile, but the StarClan cat meets their eyes with fire in their gaze. StarClan is unhappy with c_n, and things must change.
antagonize_text: r_c feels hounded, never given a moment's peace, and they hiss at the StarClan cat. The ghost vanishes like a puff of fog in the morning sun, hopefully not to return.
antagonize_fail_text: r_c feels hounded, never given a moment's peace, and they hiss at the StarClan cat. But when they turn around, there's only a rather upset looking Clanmate, there to fetch them to camp to help with an emergency.

intro_text: As p_l pads through c_n territory with their entourage, they feel a presence join them.
decline_text: Their companion stays with them as silent support while they continue on.
success_text: p_l softly alerts the rest of the patrol of their visitor. With respectful nods, the patrol pauses, tucks their paws together neatly, and sit to converse with the StarClan cat.
The scent of a familiar pelt reaches r_c's nose - they know this cat! With a friendly purr, they turn to greet their friend from beyond the grave. The rest of the patrol gives them some space.
With the familiarity brought by their connection to StarClan, s_c turns to the ghost haunting their path, meeting their star-walking ancestor with a purr and quiet confidence.
fail_text: The connection wavers, and as quickly as the feeling of company appears, it vanishes.
r_c turns to the ghost with a smile, but the StarClan cat meets their eyes with fire in their gaze. StarClan is unhappy with c_n, and things must change.
antagonize_text: r_c feels hounded, never given a moment's peace, and they hiss at the StarClan cat. The ghost vanishes like a puff of fog in the morning sun, hopefully not to return.
antagonize_fail_text: r_c feels hounded, never given a moment's peace, and they hiss at the StarClan cat. But when they turn around, there's only a rather upset looking Clanmate, there to fetch them to camp to help with an emergency.

intro_text: As app1 pads through c_n territory, they feel a presence join them.
decline_text: Their companion stays with them as silent support while they work. It's a little unnerving, but app1 thinks they mean well?
success_text: This is utterly unnerving, but with a respectful and shaky nod, app1 pauses, tucks their paws together neatly, and sits to converse with the StarClan cat.
The scent of a familiar pelt reaches app1's nose - they know this cat! They wheel around and bury their face in sparkling fur, purring frantically.
fail_text: The connection wavers, and as quickly as the feeling of company appears, it vanishes. app1 pads uncertainly back to camp, wondering if it was even real in the first place.

app1 turns to the ghost with a smile, but the StarClan cat meets their eyes with fire in their gaze. StarClan is unhappy with c_n, and things must change. app1 cowers in front of them, wishing they were anywhere else.
antagonize_text: app1 feels hounded, never given a moment's peace, and they hiss at the StarClan cat. The ghost vanishes like a puff of fog in the morning sun, hopefully not to return.
antagonize_fail_text: app1 feels hounded, never given a moment's peace, and they hiss at the StarClan cat. But when they turn around, there's only a rather upset looking Clanmate, there to fetch them to camp to help with an emergency.

intro_text: As app1 pads through c_n territory, they feel a presence join them.
decline_text: Their companion stays with them as silent support while they work.
success_text: With respectful nods, the patrol pauses. app1 takes their lead from p_l and tucks their paws together neatly, sitting to converse with the StarClan cat.
The scent of a familiar pelt reaches app1's nose - they know this cat! They wheel around and bury their face in sparkling fur, purring frantically.

With the familiarity brought by their connection to StarClan, s_c turns to the ghost haunting their path, meeting their Star-walking ancestor with a purr and quiet confidence. app1 watches with eyes as round and dark as the new moon.
fail_text: The connection wavers, and as quickly as the feeling of company appears, it vanishes.
app1 turns to the ghost with a smile, but the StarClan cat meets their eyes with fire in their gaze. StarClan is unhappy with c_n, and things must change.
antagonize_text: app1 feels hounded, never given a moment's peace, and they hiss at the StarClan cat. The ghost vanishes like a puff of fog in the morning sun, hopefully not to return.
antagonize_fail_text: app1 feels hounded, never given a moment's peace, and they hiss at the StarClan cat. But when they turn around, there's only a rather upset looking clanmate, there to fetch them to camp to help with an emergency.

intro_text: During a patrol looking for herbs, p_l notices that r_c seems more quiet than usual. When prompted, r_c slowly asks if p_l could teach them more about the nature of StarClan.
decline_text: p_l opens their mouth to answer, but the cry of another patrol looking for them shuts down the conversation. p_l races away towards the scene leaving r_c behind.
success_text: p_l eventually relents and begins teaching r_c more about StarClan and the nature of prophecies. Expecting boredom, p_l was shocked when they saw wonder in r_c's face. The two spend the rest of the patrol pondering the nature of their ancestors together.

p_l eventually relents and begins teaching r_c more about StarClan and the nature of prophecies. r_c takes to it quickly, marveling at their ancestors. They attempt to bug p_l about any recent prophecies, but p_l only laughs and gets the patrol back on track for herbs.

s_c had seen before how connected p_l was to StarClan, and began telling them more than they would have told any other Clan cat about their ancestors. p_l and s_c spend much of their patrol gathering herbs and discussing the hard-hitting questions on prophecies and StarClan's gifts.
fail_text: p_l tries to simplify the mystical power of their ancestors, but it only leaves r_c more confused about StarClan and their prophecies.

intro_text: To p_l's concern, their warrior escort is unusually quiet. When prompted on their troubles, r_c comments that they could not help but think of what legacy they would leave behind if StarClan calls upon them.
decline_text: p_l isn't sure how to exactly address such a statement, and quickly attempts to distract r_c with some herb collecting.
success_text: p_l and r_c spend their time on the patrol discussing how, to StarClan, the end of their life did not mean it was the true end. Even in StarClan, cats had their role to play. r_c's legacy would shine brighter than any star. Comforted by these words, r_c thanks p_l and helps bring back the herbs.

p_l knew why this bothered s_c so much. A powerful connection to StarClan for either of them allowed them to understand how their legacy would be told again and again to kits in the future. But p_l did their best to ease s_c's worries. To c_n, s_c would be a legend worth remembering one day. s_c brightens up at that remark, and the two go back to their herb hunt.
fail_text: p_l attempts to soothe r_c's worries, but nothing seems to stick. r_c turns back towards the camp, leaving p_l alone to fruitlessly hunt for herbs.

intro_text: It was one of the worst storms of the season, and left p_l in an unavoidably grumpy mood. Herbs strewn about, prey in hiding, it would take forever to find anything. r_c attempts to find a way to cheer up the healer.
decline_text: But before r_c could come up with a plan, a cry from the camp forces p_l to return in a hurry.
success_text: r_c splashes water from a puddle onto p_l's fur. p_l fluffs up like a bottlebrush, turning around to quickly send a wave of water back towards r_c! The two engage in a small water fight, and when they resume the herb patrol, r_c is glad to see p_l looks much happier.
fail_text: r_c splashes water from a puddle at p_l. p_l turns around and hisses at r_c that they don't have time for kit games! The two continue their patrol, but p_l's sour mood distracts them from any usable herbs they could find.
